forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 45. North northeast wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 56 in the afternoon. North northeast wind around 9 mph.

weather_report:
As the sun begins its slow ascent, a gentle hush blankets Downtown San Francisco, the remnants of night still lingering in the crisp air. The forecast promises a day of cheerful clarity, with morning skies opening up, revealing the delicate blue above. Temperatures, while cool, will climb into the comfortable realm of the low sixties, particularly inviting after the chill of the early morning. A light breeze from the northeast whispers through the streets, enticing inhabitants to embrace the day.

Given this pleasant transition, venture out for a leisurely walk along the Embarcadero, where the soft sounds of the waves greet you, or perhaps visit one of the charming cafés that dot the neighborhood; a warm cup of coffee can chase away the early morning coolness. Dress in layers—perhaps a soft sweater layered beneath a light jacket, ready to shed as the sun warms your path. The absence of fog today, especially as one gazes across the bay toward the iconic outlines of the Golden Gate Bridge, speaks of a rare treat, a clear canvas on which the city can paint its daily story. Enjoy this peaceful moment of winter in San Francisco, where each breeze carries a hint of possibility.
